pullrequest.title: Add a 'run repeat' attribute to shot files.

content.raw:
I noticed two things while testing:

1. All h5 files have a `run repeat` of 0. I left a comment on line 407 on how to fix this.
2. There are calls to `clean_h5_file` when a exception occurs during shot execution. If we have a exception during a repetition the `run repeat` will be set to 0 in the current implementation.
content.html:
I noticed two things while testing:

  1. All h5 files have a run repeat of 0. I left a comment on line 407 on how to fix this.
  2. There are calls to clean_h5_file when a exception occurs during shot execution. If we have a exception during a repetition the run repeat will be set to 0 in the current implementation.
